scripts.build: npx foal rmdir build && tsc -p tsconfig.app.json
scripts.dev: npm run postgres:start && npm run build && concurrently -r "tsc -p tsconfig.app.json -w" "supervisor -w ./build,./config -e js,json,yml --no-restart-on error ./build/index.js"
scripts.build:test: npx foal rmdir build && tsc -p tsconfig.test.json
scripts.test: npm run postgres:start && npm run build:test && concurrently -r "tsc -p tsconfig.test.json -w" "mocha --file ./build/test.js -w \"./build/**/*.spec.js\""
scripts.build:e2e: npx foal rmdir build && tsc -p tsconfig.e2e.json
scripts.e2e: npm run postgres:start && npm run build:e2e && concurrently -r "tsc -p tsconfig.e2e.json -w" "mocha --file ./build/e2e.js -w \"./build/e2e/**/*.js\""
scripts.makemigrations: npm run postgres:start && npx foal rmdir build && tsc -p tsconfig.app.json && npx typeorm migration:generate src/migrations/migration -d build/db -p && tsc -p tsconfig.app.json
scripts.migrations: npm run postgres:start && npx typeorm migration:run -d build/db
scripts.revertmigration: npm run postgres:start && npx typeorm migration:revert -d build/db
scripts.migration:generate: npx typeorm migration:generate src/migrations/migration -d build/db -p && tsc -p tsconfig.app.json
